Herphah:
I have the perfect job for your current skill level.
You've made great progress, but only under the protection of the Balthus Knights. You know nothing about the real world. I can't be always with you to explain every single detail. You should learn about Aden and its people through experience, not through words.
So, I'd like to recommend a mission. Follow my instructions and start the Way of Wandering Knight and perform the missions of the Adventure Guild. With this, you should be able to pass off as an informed individual.
